tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: In my case i was very dissatisfied with my doctor's attitude and was looking for a doctor who can make my experience happy and stress free...one of my friend recommended me to visit Dr.Neeta Mishra ji .. being 36 weeks pregnant and changing a doctor at dis time was a big decision for me..but i trusted my friend and visited ma'am...believe me i was very happy and felt at ease after meeting her..and thanks a lot ma'am for taking my case at such a last stage of pregnancy... keep smiling maam and stay blessed..
reply_text: Asna congratulations...on arrival of our angel.a pleasure for me too for your complete faith .The medical miracles happen only when we work together......

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Simply she is very polite and well experienced...
-Give enough time to consult with patient.
- Very nicely explains everything.
******** **** ***********-Friendly environment in her clinic.
-She prefers for normal delivery first if u want.
-Expert surgeon. My wife is fit and fine just in one week after surgery done by her.
-We are blessed with a healthy baby under her treatment.
- Recommend you to visit Dr. Neeta Misra if you are really looking for a good ghynocologist.

Thanks,
Pallab Dutta & Pompi Dutta
Noida
reply_text: Thanks for your kind words pallav

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is a doctor with Motherly touch,you start feeling good just after knowing that you are with her and she is going to take care of you.Its really a divine clinic.Staffs are helping,we became like family.She listen to you carefully,write important things and plan accordingly.She understand your suffering beyond medical reports and enjoys success she achieve for you beyond a doctors level.THANK YOU!!BLESS YOU!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: I will never recommend Dr. Nita misra to any friend or anybody I know. Apart from long waiting time (1.5 hour) even after taking the appointment 2 days in advance the most disturbing thing was the behaviour of doctor. I took my mother for menopause complications she is having. The doctor at first listen and discussed the medical history of my mother then started scaring us of cervical cancer.. and pushing me to take the vaccine for cervical cancer which is available at her clinic. * ** * ******** ******* ** * ** **** ***** ** *** ********** *** ********** ***** ** ************ *********** ***** ******* ** ** *** ******* ** ** *** ********** *** ******** ******* Though the patient was my mother. The interesting part it, once you go to her clinic, her receptionist does not charge you before seeing the doctor. Instead she insists to first let the doctor examine you and then you can pay her. The catch is, that even though you are visiting the doctor for regular consultations she does this pap smear test. ***** ** ******** ** ** **** **** ** * ****** *** *** ****** **** ** **** ** *** **** *** **** *** *** ** ***** ** *** **** *** *** **** ******* ****** ********** **** *** ***** **** *** **** ***** **** **** *** *** ***** ***** **** ** ** ******* 4 days later we got the report in which she was negative for cervical cancer , however she had some infection in uterus. When we took the reports to doctor she scared by telling my mother on her face that cancer ho skta. This is what she said when she didn't even flip the page of the report to see the result. Though her receptionist prompted her that the report is negative but she continued to scare me and my mother and later got to me convincing to get vaccine from her clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Appalling experience, In this day and age of internet doctors should be open to the fact that patient will not just accept their consult without question. I took my wife for  pcod , and my wife and I  were researching this for some time , so I wanted to discuss more and get clarification around course of treatment. The minute I asked questions she got angry wtih  me *** ***** * **** ****** * I never questioned her intelligence or experience just wanted to  her help to make a good decision. Doctor should understand that they are consultant and  we are their seeking help from pain not judgement.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I do not recommend this doctor as I visited with my wife for regular pregnancy check up and wanted to consult about planning for second child. She did *********** checkup which is just not expected from such a experienced doctor. She even did a uturus cancer check ***** * ***** ** *** ******** ** *** ** *** **** *** ******** My wife is in her early thirties, so age is also not that much. The main thing is my wife do not have any issue. *** ****** ** **** **** ***** *** ** *** ******* *** * ******* ****** *** **** ** *** Not recommended at all ****** *** **** ** *** ***** ********** * ****** * *** **** ******** ** **** * ***********

tags: None
review: This was my second visit to the doctor for the same symptom for which I had refered to the doctor earlier, i.e., swelling of vulva. *** ******* ****** **** **** ********* ** *** ***** ***** ******* *** ******* It was only diagnosed on the second visit when the symptoms got worse *** *** *** **** ** **** *** *********** The physical examination was very rough, despite me telling the doctor that it was hurting a lot. I was also being recommend to take more tests **** ******** ******** but I did not go for them. Overall, it pained me- the whole experience.
reply_text:
Sonya many times patient may feel swelling of some organ but it may not be clinically visible.
In such situation aggressive treatment is avoided for lack of clinical evidence.
Symptomatic relief was advised to you on the first visit also.
On second visit to assess the persistence of symptoms vaginal swab was taken to know the cause.

As for other test advised ,we at divine clinic are spreading awareness on preventive tests for cervical cancer which is a leading cause of death of women in our country.we have even employed a councillor for increasing awareness.
In view of your persistent vaginal itching it is wise to go for the test advised.
Vaginal examination was paid full for you .this was indicative of infection ,hence vaginal swab test was  taken.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I delivered a healthy and super cute baby girl 10 days back in the proper guidance of Dr. Neeta Misra.. She is one of those superb persons i have ever met in my life. She really takes a very good care of her patients with a very positive attitude.. I am really very glad to have my daughter in the guidance of her.. May God Bless her Ever......
reply_text: God bless you and our little one Marzia...

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I am married in joint family and all kids of our family had been taken care from womb till birth by Dr. Neeta Misra...we r thankful to her for all her guidance and care taken during entire pregnancy procedure. Best part is she gives exact picture of the current situation. Seeing her makes one forget the pain..her smile steals the worries of a person....God bless her always....

tags: None
review:
Fabulous
She is very understanding and explains each and every thing very clearly.
Its veru difficult nowadays to choose doctors *** *** *** * ***** *** ** *** **** ** *** * **** *** *** **** *** no one cares the way she does for her patients.
Thankyou souch mam!!
reply_text: Thanks for your kind words Anita.

reply_text: Thank you Rafat.The connect works wonders.

tags: None
review: Appoint scheduled at 4 and waited till 5.It wa very bad experience to wait even after appointment.Although as a doctor she is OK but timmings should be given importance
reply_text: We value your time but there can be unexpected delay in case of an unforeseen previous patients complicated case requiring urgent attention resulting in excess time.

review: Excellent, she takes enough time and make patients more comfortable.She is expert in the concerned field.

review: It was a great experience as the dr explained all our queries, we were highly comfortable with the dr in discussing our issues .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Diseases in Pregnancy,Lower Segment Caesarean Section (LSCS),Child Birth Education,
review: Dr Neeta Mishra has taken my case in my 8th month of pregnancy. She is a very nice doctor as well as human being. She is so friendly, caring, ready to explains everything, clear all patient's doubts. I would definitely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Friendly doctor ,  listen everything  ,  discuss each and every thing . Very perfect dr . Neeta Misra

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Doctor is very patient n listen to u....not at all in hurry...explained everything very  nice n in common man language....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Doctor is good and deeply understands your problem. Gives full time to listen your issue and polite. 
But the doctor fees doesn't match with the one shown on Practo. They charged Rs 200 extra.
reply_text:
We are happy to know that we could take care of your issues.
Sometimes when there is long history of patient 100_200 rs may be charged for the same.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
She was an excellent in terms of counselling and suggestions she have handled my case wonderfully i would like to thank her many times that it because of Dr. Neeta Mishra i m not suffering with any kind of pain now the surgery was very smooth and she is very kind and polite with her patient and more focused on their comfort and needs.

Thanks again.
